Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1861286166985953280/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Giving brand/business context"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1861286166985953280/)_"
---
[PROMPT] is a [PROMPT] brand that provides services related to [PROMPT] in multiple markets like [PROMPT]
. Their focus markets are [PROMPT]. Their ideal target users are working as [PROMPT]. Their target industries are [PROMPT]. Do you understand ? Give output in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
PromptHint: [brand name], [brand segment, eg: fintech], [primary keywords for each service],[target locations] ,[focus locations],[designations/features of target users],[brand's target industries]
